summary: PROBLEMS WITH THROTTLE BODY STICKING.  *MR  THE IDLE WAS ROUGH, THEREFORE THE THROTTLE BODY WAS ADJUSTED.  THE VEHICLE KNOCKED LOUD ON COLD START.  THE CONSUMER WAS UNSURE IF THE PROBLEM WAS THE THROTTLE BODY OR THE PISTON SLAP.  THE THROTTLE BODY WAS CLEANED AND DID NOT STICK AT THAT POINT.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED AN EXTENDED WARRANTY FREE OF CHARGE UNTIL THE PROBLEM WAS RESOLVED.  SCC
